item.title: BTR-90
item.dc:creator: wordpress4
item.description: BTR-90 "Rostok" (also designated as GAZ-5923) is a Russian armored personnel carrier. Combat wheeled floating armored vehicle, equipped with weapons, intended for use in motorized rifle units of the ground forces.
item.content:encoded:
BTR-90 “Rostok” (also designated as GAZ-5923) is a Russian armored personnel carrier. Combat wheeled floating armored vehicle, equipped with weapons, intended for use in motorized rifle units of the ground forces.

The BTR-90 was presented to the public for the first time in 1994. The developer is OJSC Gorky Automobile Plant, the manufacturer is declared by OJSC Arzamas Machine-Building Plant, serial production was planned to begin in 2011.

Tests of the armored personnel carrier were completed in 2004.

In 2011, the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation refused to purchase the BTR-90, replacing it with the BTR-82
